names.pinyin: bu shen huo xue tang jia jian
names.english: modified tonify the kidneys and invigorate the blood decoction
names.commonEnglish: Modified Tonify the Kidneys and Invigorate the Blood Decoction

actions: Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood.
Strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine, benefits the marrow and tonifies the Kidneys and Liver.

With Du Zhong, enriches and tonifies the Kidneys and Liver, astringes Jing, nourishes Kidney Yin, brightens the eyes and encourages the movement of Primal Yang to treat spermatorrhea, premature ejaculation and lower back pain from Kidney Deficiency.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin.
With Du Zhong, for low back pain.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and stabilizes Jing.
With Rou Cong Rong, for constipation due to Dryness of the Intestines.
Stabilizes the Kidneys, astringes Jing and Body Fluids, tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin and strengthens Kidney Yang.
With Dang Gui and Bu Gu Zhi, for Kidney Yang Deficiency leading to spermatorrhea, premature ejaculation and lower backache.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang,
benefits Jing and marrow.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, alleviates pain and reduces swelling.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels and alleviates pain.
Expels Wind-Dampness, opens the channels and soothes the sinews and collaterals.
Tonifies the Kidneys and Liver, strengthens the sinews and bones and aids the smooth flow of Qi and Blood.
With Shan Zhu Yu and Tu Si Zi, for impotence and frequent urination due to Deficiency Cold of the Kidneys.
Tonifies and nourishes the Kidneys and Liver
Invigorates the Blood
Strengthens the low back
syndromes: Liver and Kidney Yin Deficiency with Blood Stagnation

symptoms: An enduring condition in an older commonly thin patient
The pain is worse in the evening and after periods of inactivity and better with moderate exercise
The pain is worse wit excessive activity
A liking for pressure or massage in the area
Low back and knee soreness and weakness
